name: Losing Time
description:
Made in 48 hours for #gmtkjam 2020- "Out of Control"

This is a personal look at my own mind through an anxious conversation over text. 

If you are dealing with anxiety or depression, hopefully this can show you that you are not alone. If you have friends that struggle, perhaps this can illuminate their hurdles for you.

I do not claim to be an expert on these topics, but these are essentially my raw thoughts. In sharing them, I hope you can find something to take away for yourself.

Enjoy the trip!
